name: verifyLastViewedProductAddedToTheList
description: Verifies that products opened by user are displayed on home page under recently viewed products list in order from last opened to first opened
descriptionHtml: Verifies that products opened by user are displayed on home page under recently viewed products list in order from last opened to first opened
statusMessage:
[First product name in Recently Opened products should be equal to last viewed product name] 
expected: "Мясорубка BOSCH MFW3640A"
 but was: "Набор Spell для нее 500 г (7500000311029)"

steps.name: ProductCategoryPage: open product type page by category KITCHEN_APPLIANCES_CATEGORY(tehnika-dlya-kuhni)
ProductPage: get product type page visibility status by locating page heading
ProductTypePage: open product page by product number 1
HomePage: get product name number 1 from Recently Viewed Products list
